alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Harris (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 08 at 11:14PM CST by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Fort Bend and central Harris Counties through 1145 PM CST... At 1114 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Four Corners, or over Mission Bend, moving northeast at 35 mph. Weak rotation was noted with this storm. A severe thunderstorm or tornado warning may be required with further intensification. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Sugar Land, Jersey Village, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Town West, Northside / Northline, Spring Branch North, Eldridge / West Oaks, Spring Branch West, Addicks Park Ten, Spring Valley, Mission Bend, northwestern Greater Heights, Pecan Grove, northwestern Memorial Park, Hedwig Village, Hilshire Village, Spring Branch East and Spring Branch Central. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CST for southeastern Texas.
